类 MesosResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.RpcEndpoint

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    LeaderContender, ResourceManagerGateway, FencedRpcGateway<ResourceManagerId>, RpcGateway

    public class MesosResourceManager
extends ResourceManager<RegisteredMesosWorkerNode>
    The Mesos implementation of the resource manager.

                   throws ResourceManagerException

        抛出:
        ResourceManagerException - which occurs during initialization and causes the resource manager to fail.

      • postStop

        public void postStop()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: RpcEndpoint
        User overridable callback.

        This method is called when the RpcEndpoint is being shut down. The method is guaranteed to be executed in the main thread context and can be used to clean up internal state. IMPORTANT: This method should never be called directly by the user.

        覆盖:
        postStop 在类中 ResourceManager<RegisteredMesosWorkerNode>
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs. The exception is returned as result of the termination future.

      • shutDownApplication

        protected void shutDownApplication(ApplicationStatus finalStatus,
                                   java.lang.String optionalDiagnostics)
                            throws ResourceManagerException
        从类复制的说明: ResourceManager
        The framework specific code for shutting down the application. This should report the application's final status and shut down the resource manager cleanly.

        This method also needs to make sure all pending containers that are not registered yet are returned.

        指定者:
        shutDownApplication 在类中 ResourceManager<RegisteredMesosWorkerNode>
        参数:
        finalStatus - The application status to report.
        optionalDiagnostics - An optional diagnostics message.
        抛出:
        ResourceManagerException - if the application could not be shut down.

      • acceptOffers

        public void acceptOffers(AcceptOffers msg)
        Accept offers as advised by the launch coordinator.

        Acceptance is routed through the RM to update the persistent state before forwarding the message to Mesos.
